projects.title: Toxic Message Classification
projects.description: Classification of toxic messages into six different categories and predicting the level of toxicity. - Ensemble modeling of CNN and Bidirectional GRU.
projects.details:
Programming Language - Python
Libraries used - Scikit-Learn, Tensorflow, Keras, Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, Flask Web Framework
